name: Grains
description: Rice, wheat, corn products: bread, cereals, pasta, bran, wheat germ, pizza, pancakes

name: Fruit and fruit products
description: Fruit: fresh, dried, frozen or canned

name: Meat and poultry
description: Poultry, game, beef, pork, sheep, processed meats

name: Vegetables
description: Vegetables and products, potatoes: french fried, baked, boiled, etc (no chips)

name: Legumes/nuts/seeds
description: Pulses, lima beans, peas, etc, soy beans, tofu, seeds, nuts, peanut butter

name: Sugar and sugar products
description: Chocolate, candy bars, cookies, cakes, pies, jams/jellies

name: Non-alcoholic beverages
description: Water, coffee/tea, lemonades, carbonated drinks, fruit and vegetable juices
